summary: Provides a differentiable loss based on the 3D Structural Similarity (SSIM) index, computing structural dissimilarity (DSSIM) as (1 - SSIM)/2 with configurable window size, dynamic range, stability epsilon, reduction mode, and padding strategy.
business_intent: Facilitate training of neural networks on volumetric image data by offering a perceptual similarity loss that guides models toward generating or reconstructing volumes that closely match reference data.
